org.firstinspires.ftc.ftccommon.external

Class SoundPlayingRobotMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.firstinspires.ftc.ftccommon.external.SoundPlayingRobotMonitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RobotStateMonitor

    public class SoundPlayingRobotMonitor
extends java.lang.Object
implements RobotStateMonitor
    SoundPlayingRobotMonitor is an implementation of RobotStateMonitor that plays sounds at certain event transitions within the Robot Controller application.
